product.title: The Aristocats and the Missing Necklace | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Aristocats and the Missing Necklace

Duchess and her three kittens, Marie, Berlioz, and Toulouse, make an adventuresome appearance in this delightful reprise based on the renowned 1970 Disney animated film. Duchess and her kittens elicit the assistance of Roquefort the mouse as they set out in search of Madame Bonfamille’s gold necklace. Young readers will be captivated by this imaginative tale of animal camaraderie, teamwork, and loyalty.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to share an example of when she’s lost a favorite toy or book, and how she felt when she found the missing item. Together, brainstorm ideas for keeping track of items, such as setting aside special places for books, hair accessories, and toys.
